name: FLYING On The WORLDS LARGEST PLANE During LOCKDOWN
description:
What's it like on the world's largest plane during lockdown? Come with me and experience First and Business Class onboard the huge Airbus A380. 
We start our journey today in Dubai the home of Emirates. My aim today is to show you what it's like to fly onboard the only carrier operating the A380 at present. With every other airline grounding they A380s Emirates still operates these on key routes such as the London route i'm flying today. 

I'm also check out the exclusive shower spa onboard, as well as bar and lounge area. Unfortunately these are closed until further notice but I still was able to check these out. Thanks to the wonderful crew onboard today's flight!

----------

Emirates Business Class 
A380 world's largest plane
